title: Tankard, 1986-61-10, ca. 1760–73
markings: Marks: Three thumpiece appears to have been resoldered.
description: Cylindrical body with molded band 1/3 way up side, flared molded base, stepped domed lid hinged to long loop handle; twisted wire thumbpiece top of handle and heart-shaped end of piece; hinge has trailing molded end; fluted, scalloped collar at joining of handle to body.
